headline: How Disney’s US$1 Billion OpenAI Deal and New IP Pact Could Impact Walt Disney (DIS) Investors
summary: Adeia Inc. recently announced a long-term media IP licensing agreement with The Walt Disney Company that resolves all prior litigation and secures broad rights for Disney’s streaming and entertainment products. A separate three-year, US$1.00 billion licensing and equity deal with OpenAI, alongside the solid global launch of Avatar: Fire and Ash, underlines how Disney is tying its content engine to emerging AI tools while reinforcing its box office reach. We’ll now examine how Disney’s...
